original_text: So then, what do we learn from that? We cannot say that we Jews are better than other people. No, certainly we cannot say that! I have said already that sin has power over everyone. That is true for both Jews and Gentiles. So then, what do we learn from that? We cannot say that we Jews are better than other people. No, certainly we cannot say that! I have said already that sin has power over everyone. That is true for both Jews and Gentiles.
korean_text: 그러면 어떠하냐 우리는 나으냐 결코 아니라 유대인이나 헬라인이나 다 죄 아래에 있다고 우리가 이미 선언하였느니라

sentences.original_text: So then, what do we learn from that?
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 우리는 그것으로부터 무엇을 배우게 됩니까?

sentences.original_text: We cannot say that we Jews are better than other people.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 유대인들이 다른 사람들보다 더 낫다고 말할 수 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: No, certainly we cannot say that!
sentences.korean_translation: 아니요, 분명히 그렇다고 말할 수 없습니다!

sentences.original_text: I have said already that sin has power over everyone.
sentences.korean_translation: 이미 말했듯이 죄는 모든 사람에게 권세를 가집니다.

sentences.original_text: That is true for both Jews and Gentiles.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 유대인과 이방인 모두에게 해당되는 사실입니다.

sentences.original_text: So then, what do we learn from that?
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 우리는 그것으로부터 무엇을 배우게 됩니까?

sentences.original_text: We cannot say that we Jews are better than other people.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 유대인들이 다른 사람들보다 더 낫다고 말할 수 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: No, certainly we cannot say that!
sentences.korean_translation: 아니요, 분명히 그렇다고 말할 수 없습니다!

sentences.original_text: I have said already that sin has power over everyone.
sentences.korean_translation: 이미 말했듯이 죄는 모든 사람에게 권세를 가집니다.

sentences.original_text: That is true for both Jews and Gentiles.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 유대인과 이방인 모두에게 해당되는 사실입니다.
